description:
Amu and Tadase are walking home together, which they hadn`t done in a while. Amu is not honest with her feelings as usual, and Ran can`t stand it so Character Changes Amu! Rikka happens to see it walking by, and thinks it`s totally great! She asks Amu to change one after another until she`s completely worn out.  Eventually Rikka asks to Character Change with Miki to help her with arts and crafts, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 魅惑のキャラチェンジ!
